page.title: 05Annual Parish Meeting 1985
page.content: village entertainments but it seems this apathy permeates every facet of village life. Many organisations seem to be experiencing declining attendances and interest despite a continuing rise in the population and an increase in leisure time. We are in danger of becoming a dormitory village and thus destroying, by neglect, the very environment many of us moved here to be part of. The Parish Council would like to see more people at village meetings but they don't want people who just want to protest about a particular local grievance, or to enlist the aid of the Parish Council in furthering a personal cause, but to come and share in all aspects of the most local of local government.
